TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔː l s ɛ l ɚ æ s k æ t ɚ b ɹ ɪ ɪ ŋ ð ə s ɪ ŋ s w ɪ ð h ɜː f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔː ɪ k s p uː s ʌ v f ɹ æ ʃ s m oʊ p iː s f aɪ v t eɪ k s l eɪ k s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː s æ n d d n eɪ v i s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɑː b w ɪ ɔː l s oʊ n ɪ t ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n ɛ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t ɔːɹ f l ɑː k f ɔːɹ ð ə k ɪ d z s iː k æ n s k uː ð ə s s ɪ ŋ k s ɪ n t ɚ θ ɹ iː ɹ æ d b æ k s æ n d w ɪ w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ ð ə t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n

SNACK INCONTEXT: snæk
